attributes.action: Allow the public to Vote on COVID restrictions and Lockdowns
attributes.additional_details: Democracy needs to be re-established in the UK and we the people should have a say in any proposed restrictions which directly impact upon the ways in which we live, work and socialise and go about our daily lives.
attributes.background: Allow the public a voting system on all current and future local tiered restrictions; and any current and future national lockdowns that are proposed by Government. This includes anything that is currently or will be defined as a guideline, rule or a law.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551539
